ELSE post_title End as post_title , a.* , b.* , c.num from tbl_post a FULL OUTER JOIN tbl_post_img b on a.post_seq= b.post_seq join ( select tbl_basket.*, row_number() over(order by post_seq desc) as num from tbl_basket where user_id=#{user_id} ) c on a.post_seq=c.post_seq and post_img_seq IN ( SELECT MIN(post_img_seq) FROM tbl_post_img GROUP BY post_seq) where NOT post_title is NULL and c.user_id=#{user_id} and num between #{start} and #{end} order by c.post_seq desc
